name: Depth Gauge
description:
WASD - Movement

RF - More Movement unlocked later

G - Use the rope

Space - Might delete the world if I forgot to remove it.

Play as the kid as he gets his second job. All he's got to do is collect some ores for his boss. That there's a good job 'round these part for a boy o' 12.

Dig deep, then ride the rope up to cash in your ores and buy upgrades. You're going to need at least 1 pick upgrade to mine the deep ore. Dig down again for a new random hole.

Kind of a sequel to another game I made, Bullet Farm. 

Version 2: Fixed audio and added a mute button. The sound effects sounded ok on my headphones, but can sound terrible on others. Like needles to the ear bad. I listened to it on my brother's headphones and using my laptop speakers and the sound pops a lot. I reduced the volume in unity and that might have fixed it, but if not, there's now a mute button.

Made with Unity, Paint.net, Bfxr

Code if you want: https://github.com/TyLanger/DepthGauge

Font: https://pixeloverload.itch.io/basicfonts
